title: HR-student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation in Mar 2023
Interview Descriptions: It was a virtual interview with two interviewers, one is the Volunteer Coordinator and the other one is the HR Associate. You have to introduce yourself and answer 10 interview questions,

title: Intern Interview
Interview Descriptions: 30 Minute panel interview with in-depth questions and then a project that we had to create that had a one week turn around time. The entire process took about 2 to 2 and a half weeks.

title: Partnerships Manager Interview
Interview Descriptions:
Well informed - good communication with org. 

Panel interviews - you’ll know who you are speaking with. Questions given 20 mins in advance of interview. 

Assignment - will be job relevant. 

Meeting members of the team - it was a great experience.

title: HPC System Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation (Toronto, ON) in Jun 2022
Interview Descriptions:
First round was a discussion call to understand if your experience and skills are suited for the role. They also ask behavioral questions.
Second round is the technical round mainly focused on Linux. They give a Linux environment in which you'll need to execute the commands whatever they ask you to do
Interview Questions: Be confident with the basic Linux and bash commands

title: Senior Specialist Interview
Application Type: The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview , first interview with the team, second interview with the stakeholders, and a third with VP. It is usually quite informal. Second interview has a lengthy exercise and project , which is ridiculous given they ask several people to do it. Takes about 10 hours or longer to do it
Interview Questions: What interests you , tell us what you know , what do you know

title: Corporate Partnership Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation (Toronto, ON) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: 2 interviews including a presentation. The first is a 1v1 interview, the second is an interview with 3 managers. After the first one, you will be given a case to solve but it's nothing numerical.
Interview Questions:
Why SickKids 
Behavioural questions around customer service and sales

title: Marketing Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was short and pretty relaxed. I met with two of the division heads, whom I would have worked closely with. Both of which were quite friendly, and open about the details of working at Sick Kids. I didn't end up getting the job, but they followed up right away instead of leaving me waiting to hear back.
Interview Questions: Why are you looking to leave your current role?

title: Data Entry Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation (Toronto, ON) in Nov 2018
Interview Descriptions:
During the onsite interview, they asked me some behavioural questions and for some details of my working experience, degree, and availability.
Two interviewers participated in the interview process, and they are all very nice and caring.
Interview Questions: How do you arrange your time for several tasks with strict deadline?

title: Data Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation (Toronto, ON) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: First just descriptions on what SickKids is, then they would ask interview questions. After, they ask if we have any knowledge on pediatrics. Overall the interview process was very easy, and no coding questions were asked.
Interview Questions: Please describe your projects and show that you are a detail oriented person

title: Front End Web Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation (Toronto, ON) in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: Had a phone interview first then had a in person interview with two people. Was asked some CSS questions along with behavioral questions. I was waiting to hear about my 3rd interview with the IT director but never received a response from anyone.
Interview Questions: Can you use absolute positioning for mobile devices?

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation (Toronto, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Three step interview process - phone interview followed by two separate in person interviews. Questions were reasonable without anything too out of left field.  Skills test was also completed but was nothing too complicated and was directly related to the position.
Interview Questions: What can you bring to the position that others can't.

title: Front End Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation (Toronto, ON) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: A more technical meeting with a senior front end developer and a digital marketing manager. It was an hour process talking about my experience and being asked technical questions regarding front end development. As well as talking about the expectations and process of the company.
Interview Questions: What tools are you currently using in developing client side software?

title: Biostatistical Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation
Interview Descriptions: I applied online- got invited to an interview 4 weeks later. It was panel interview (3 people) with mostly questions related to my previous experience and a couple behavioral questions.

title: Project Coordinator, Systems Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation
Interview Descriptions: One phone interview took place since I was out of town. There were three interviewers. The project manager, IT director, and associate director. They were very friendly and wanted answered that were straight to the point.
Interview Questions: How do you deal with end users?

title: Research Student Interview Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation in Jul 2014
Interview Descriptions:
One interview with two interviewers. Both were extremely approachable and friendly and I did not feel threatened in anyway at any point. No invasive questions. Covered all necessary/expected questions. Explained the job description and expectations well and followed up as they said they would in a professional manner.
Interview room was well-lit, comfortable, quiet with no distractions.
Overall great interview experience.

title: Database Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at SickKids Foundation (Toronto, ON) in Jul 2014
Interview Descriptions: It was a single interview, with a panel from the lab. It was straight to the point, and they were quick in their decision making.the interview was 20 minutes long, mostly technical.
Interview Questions:
What is a view? What are the advantages and disadvantages of views in a database?
What is the difference between Cluster and Non cluster Index?
What are properties of a transaction?
